text: Ashley Lawrence Pullen (18 February 1956 - 6 June 2002)Oakes, P & Rising, P (1986). 1986 Speedway Yearbook. was a former speedway rider in the United Kingdom, who spent much of his career with Rye House Rockets in the National League. Pullen was a member of the Rye House team that completed the National League Championship and Knockout Cup double in 1980.Jacobs, Norman (2007). 70 Years of Rye House Speedway. Pullen was born in Oxford, England and died from cancer in 2002. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2002 deaths Category:British speedway riders Category:English motorcycle racers Category:Sportspeople from Oxford Category:Rye House Rockets riders Category:Oxford Cheetahs riders Category:Reading Racers riders Category:Cradley Heathens riders Category:Eastbourne Eagles riders Category:Peterborough Panthers riders Category:Stoke Potters riders Category:Milton Keynes Knights riders
title: Ashley Pullen
